QAs.question: Is this image taken outdoors?
Does the image show a crowded room with multiple people?
Does the image show a high-ceiling interior space with a minimalist design?
Is this image upside down?
Is there a hanging light fixture present in the image?
Is there a lampshade or light bulb visible in the image?
Is there a sheer curtain present in the image?
Are there any potted plants visible in the image?
Is the curtain in the image opaque and non-transparent?
Is the hanging light base made of wood?
Are the windows in the image tinted blue?
Are the walls outside painted a dark color?
Is the large window located at the top of the image?
Is the hanging light base positioned toward the center of the image?
Is the curtain placed on the left side of the image?
Is the potted plant visible at the bottom-left corner of the image?
Is the hanging light base located above the windows in the image?
Is the curtain positioned behind the window in the image?
Is the potted plant located behind the windows?
Is the curtain positioned in front of a single casement window in the image?
Are there four visible windows in the image?
Are there two potted plants visible in the image?
Are there multiple hanging fixtures visible in the image?
Is there more than one curtain panel in the image?
Is the hanging fixture attached to the curtain?
Is the wire from the hanging fixture touching the windows?
Does the curtain block all of the light entering through the window?
Is sunlight shining through the window onto the wall?
Is there any visible number on the image?
Is this correct: there is the exact number '31.1' above the red point specifically referring to the camera's tilt angle?
Is this correct: there is the exact number '31.1' above the red point specifically referring to a temperature of the window?
Is this correct: there is the exact number '3110' on the window specifically indicating its size?
Is there any visible non-numerical text on the image?
Is this correct: there is the exact text 'FLIR' at the bottom left corner specifically referring to a thermal imaging brand?
Is this correct: there is the exact text 'FLI' on the hanging fixture specifically referring to its brand?
Is this correct: there is the exact text 'ELIR' at the bottom left corner specifically referring to a thermal imaging brand?
Is there any color-to-temperature scale bar on the image?
Is the following sequence of colors correctly representing temperature distribution from low to high: blue, purple, orange, yellow?
Is the following sequence of colors correctly representing temperature distribution from low to high: blue, purple, yellow, orange?
Is the following sequence of colors correctly representing temperature distribution from low to high: purple, blue, orange, yellow?
Is the thermal image viewpoint exactly the same as the RGB image viewpoint without any noticeable shift or zoom?
Is the thermal image viewpoint slightly above and to the left of the RGB image viewpoint?
In the thermal image, should the heatmap be shifted downward to correctly match the positions of black edges of the objects?
In the thermal image, should the heatmap be zoomed out to correctly match the positions of black edges of the objects?

Consider the fact that the heatmap in the thermal image should be shifted slightly downward to align with the edges of the objects. Is the curtain showing a uniform cool temperature across the entire surface in the thermal image?
